Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, south of the Oceancrest Arena.
Room.LongDescription: You can hear the cheers and jeers from the large Oceancrest Central Arena Complex located to the north. There are main entrances on both Eidenhoft Boulevard and Marina Way. It is suggested that you first visit the Arena Events and Information Center before heading into the unknown to an almost certain death. The Center is located off of Main Street.
